review.comment: Kyle and the team at My Equipment are really helpful, and professional. Doing business with them was a pleasure. I needed a 322CL CAT EXCAVATOR and Kyle had no problem finding me the model I wanted. My excavator was delivered right on time and I received a detailed explanation of the operating procedures. Great service, better people. Thanks MY Equipment!
Very bad company to deal with. The owner is not honest .they are playing with invoices and words . I dont not recommended to any one .
review.review_reply:
Thanks for your feedback however, we are unable to verify any of the information you have described.

We do take customer feedback very seriously so if you could provide any proof of invoice that you are talking about please contact us at sales@my-equipment.com.

review.comment: Best Construction Equipment Dealer in Houston TX.
